MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the G44 postcode area of Glasgow We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 5:55AM. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the Seil Drive substation to investigate the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9AM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:05AM on 29 March 2021.
